analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x97fe19dfab95b1709bb0994af18ba7f793e28cba.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.22 (/unique_contracts/0x97fe19dfab95b1709bb0994af18ba7f793e28cba.sol#13-15): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of MYSELF.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x97fe19dfab95b1709bb0994af18ba7f793e28cba.sol#176-177) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of MYSELF.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x97fe19dfab95b1709bb0994af18ba7f793e28cba.sol#183-184) is not in mixedCase
